ARABIC: قُلْ إِنْ أَدْرِىٓ أَقَرِيبٌ مَّا تُوعَدُونَ أَمْ يَجْعَلُ لَهُۥ رَبِّىٓ أَمَدًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Say: 'I do not know whether what you are promised is close or whether my Lord will appoint a longer time before it.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Say: "I do not know if what is promised you is near, or if my Lord prolongs its term.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Say: “I know not whether what you are promised is near or whether my Lord will prolong its term.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: (Muhammad), say, "I do not know whether that with which you have been threatened is close by or whether my Lord will prolong the time of its coming.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Say (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him), “I do not know whether what you are promised is close or if my Lord will postpone it for a while.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Say: "I know not whether that which you are promised is near or whether my Lord will appoint for it a distant term."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Say: I do not know whether that with which you are threatened be nigh or whether my Lord will appoint for it a term:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Say: 'I do not know whether that which you are promised is nigh, or whether my Lord will appoint for it a space;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Say (O Muhammad, unto the disbelievers): I know not whether that which ye are promised is nigh, or if my Lord hath set a distant term for it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Say, "I do not know whether what you are promised is imminent, or whether my Lord has set for it a far-off day.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Say thou: know not whather that which ye are promised is nigh, or whether my Lord hath appointed for it a distant term.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Say, ‘I do not know if what you are promised is near, or if my Lord has set a [long] term for it.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Say: "I know not whether the (Punishment) which ye are promised is near, or whether my Lord will appoint for it a distant term.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Say (O Muhammad SAW): "I know not whether (the punishment) which you are promised is near or whether my Lord will appoint for it a distant term.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Say: 'I do not know whether that which you are promised is near, or whether my Lord will set for it a time.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Say, “I do not know whether what you are promised is near, or whether my Lord will extend it for a period.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Say, "I do not know if what you are promised is near or if my Lord will grant for it a [long] period."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [72:25] Say: ‘I do not know if what you are promised, of chastisement, is near, or if my Lord has set a [distant] length for it, an extent and a term which only He knows.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Say) to them, Muhammad: (I know not whether that which ye are promised) of chastisement (is nigh, or if my Lord hath set a distant term for it.
